name: vibe-stats
description: Monitor Claude AI, OpenAI, GitHub Copilot & Google Gemini status with real-time updates and AI-themed vibe indicators
author: Todd Dube

scripts.prepare-release: npm run version:validate && npm run build:clean
scripts.release:patch:manual: npm run prepare-release && echo 'Ready for manual GitHub release (patch)'
scripts.release:minor:manual: npm run prepare-release && echo 'Ready for manual GitHub release (minor)'
scripts.release:major:manual: npm run prepare-release && echo 'Ready for manual GitHub release (major)'
scripts.version:validate: node dev/scripts/sync-version.js check && npm run about:check && npm run validate
